name: mip6d-ng
short_description:
Next Generation of Mobile IPv6 for Linux includes several client-based mobile IPv6 solutions, such as NEMO, MCoA, FMIP, HMIP, etc. and also integrates the paradigm of distributed and dynamic mobility management to enhance applicability and encourage its usage in future mobile systems. 

The implementation is modular, plugin based, naturally supports cross-layer information exchange for optimization purposes and it has well documented APIs for further extensions.
summary: Next Generation of Mobile IPv6 for Linux
